title: About Us
content:
Bloxymedia Entertainment is an American digital media company founded in 2022. Our goal at Bloxymedia Entertainment is to create and distribute content for the next generation. In 2023, it acqurired and built an Multi-Channel Network named Bloxify Media. 

 Bloxify Media is a MCN that currently has 3 channels under it's network. Creators have been able to see a 150% increase from their current stats with over 100k views across all channels and platforms.

Bloxymation Studios is one of the biggest channels on Bloxify Media's network. It has an ammasing 300 subscribers and over 70,000 views across all platforms. It is a channel that specializes in machinima videos with memes. .

Harris Jawaharlal is a channel that specializes in cars and gaming. He currently has 170 subscribers with over 40,000 views on all platforms. .

Fefloudgf is a gaming channel that specializes in gameplay footage. He has 22 subscribers with over 100 views. He was Bloxify Media's first member on their network.
